hackathon-eligibility: Anyone registered with our hackathon and is a high school student or just graduated!
hackathon-requirements: Participants need to create a technology product. Submit all code and any images of the product.
hackathon-rules:
Rules for the hackathon:
 
1. All code needs to be written during the hackathon. People who have prepared pre written code before the hackathon will be immidiately disqualified from judging.
2. Participants need to be courteous and nice to other hackers. Abusive language, physical abuse and sexual harrassment from any team member will automatically result in the whole team being disqualified.
3. Participants are not allowed to plagiarise code. Their code needs to be orignal and cannot be copied from other sources online.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: One plus one phones, misfit flashes, endevvr mentoring, sneed vouchers, Bitcoin
Pebble watches, sneed vouchers, misfits flash, Bitcoins

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Old Madras Road, Krishnamurti Nagar, Maruthi Sevanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is the product original and displays creative thinking?
How well does the product address the “Education Innovation” theme and change the way we learn?
Does the product have the ability to disrupt current markets?
Does the product have exceptional design attributes that would appeal to the end-user? Design is not aesthetic, but design thinking concepts.
Evaluate the technical achievement the team has tackled during the event.

hackathon-location-address: Old Madras Road, Krishnamurti Nagar, Maruthi Sevanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
hackathon-description-header: India's first ever hackathon for high school students exclusively!
